> <OLD - Talon>
>
> Before go with Leo Prime, Talon  left ELita and instructed her to wait her
> there.
>
> then the femme went where Leo prime was and said "Before she left the base
> she mention that she will ask permission at Tucson"said serious the
> femme"She never wil attemp to do something like that if Tucson havent
> allowed it"

<NEW>

LEO PRIME frowned as he listened to what both TALON and STRAIGHT said,
his frown deepeing as they talked.

"You should have talked with me before this was decided." He said as
they finished. he kept his voice low, but there was a hard intensity
to it.

Folding his arms over his chest as if to get a hold of himself and his
emotions LEO continued. "All communications between here and the
jungle where Tuscon has jounied to have been cut off." His look turned
slightly sorrowful. "I was there when Tuscon's signal vanished and
Polar Claw radioed in a last report before he too was caught in the
affect. His report indicated that the Jungle is covered by a strange
energy network that prohibits radio wave transmissions.

Looking at each of the femmes before him he paused as some strange
emotion passed over him. "Don't you see? She could not have
communicated with Tuscon at all. So if she is gone, then no one who
knows of this but us . . . and whoever has her."

(TAG)

Preston
